name: Sweet Nightmares
description: This is a single player 2d adventure game with mini-game-styled platform and RPG elements. It is about a girl named Casey who is pursuing her friend Luna through the world of dreams, when things take a turn for the nightmarish. Along the journey are many weird things to behold. The creative process of the game and most of its art and sound resources were created by children in the Miller School of Art video game camp - Summer 2015.
